content:
This jacket is loose and comfy,
Perfect for throwing punches,
I have 30 just like it!
info: 闲聊-对自己服装的评价-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
But then again, if I have to wear clothes I don't like just to get a chance to perform...
I'd rather stick to being my fabulous self right now!
info: 闲聊-对自己服装的评价-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
I used to think it was because I dressed too unfashionably,
and didn't leave a strong enough impression on the judges at auditions,
that's why I never got picked.
info: 闲聊-对自己服装的评价-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
I just learned that
there's actually a proper way to tie a neckerchief.
If you do it right, it won't choke you!
info: 闲聊-对自己服装的评价-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊
